text: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of the criminals."
translation.id.indonesian: Katakanlah: "Berjalanlah kamu (di muka) bumi, lalu perhatikanlah bagaimana akibat orang-orang yang berdosa.
